title: AIIMS Bathinda Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Clinical Research Coordinator Post
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) Bathinda has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Clinical Research Coordinator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma, Post Graduation, B.E/ B.Tech., or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the AIIMS Bathinda Recruitment 2025 . Interested candi...
